short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remora RMX extension used for prerelease presentations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remora RMX extension is dedicated for Remora GPS Platform. It groups vehicles depending on current time spent in Point of Interest or on route (between POIs).

Version 0.0.5 (update):
     * Display POI name as details
     * Set panel width to maximum size
_________________________________________
Version 0.0.6 (update):
     * Bug fixed: Tracked objects stopped updating in live tracking after some time
     * First folder opened after login will be expanded at every script reload (2 minutes interval) 
_________________________________________
Version 0.0.7 (Update)
    * All folders are opened (simultaneously)  at login
_________________________________________
Version 0.0.8 (Update)
    * Protocol upgraded to HTTPS
